PRODUCT DESCRIPTION / USP:
- Suitable for school children, with shoulder belt.
- Vacuum insulated keep hot or cold longer.
- Detachable stopper and auto shut off cup.
- With handle design- Easy to hold their own bottle for toddlers. 
- With stap- easy to take the bottle with for toddlers.                                      
- With anti-shock silicone bottom cover to well protect the bottle.
HEAT / COLD RETENTION:
- Hot Retention (6HRS) : Above 71° C 
- Cold Retention (6HRS) : Below 9° C

- Vacuum insulated keep hot or cold longer.
- Press and drink with straw 
- Suitable for children
